attributes.action: Stop government funding of the BBC and TV licence fees.
attributes.additional_details:
Examples of the recent issues include

-Biased coverage of Scottish independence
- Biased coverage of the EU referendum
- Abbhorent treatment of Cliff Richard -where they were fined £200,000
attributes.background:
Recently, the BBC has come under intense scrutiny for both biased media and sloppy, borderline illegal journalism.

The time has come for the BBC to lose its public funding. People should not be paying TV license for a below-par service.
